'Back to Friends' Lyrics: What Sombr Has Said About His Hit Song sombr has achieved his first Top 10 hit with his song “Back to Friends” and we’re gathering everything that he has said about the track.

The 20-year-old singer, whose real name is Shane Michael Boose, wrote the song about a breakup and it tells the story of “a really dark point” in his life.

Keep reading to find out more…

“How can we go back to being friends / When we just shared a bed? / How can you look at me and pretend / I’m someone you&rsquo Read more

Kate Middleton Makes Her First Public Speech in Two Years at Future Workforce Summit in London Princess Catherine delivers her first public speech in two years at the Future Workforce Summit.

Kate attended the event held in London on Tuesday (November 18) to highlight her Royal Foundation’s Business Taskforce for Early Childhood.Keep reading to find out more…

The Princess of Wales is continuing to ease back into public duties following her 2024 cancer diagnosis and her remission announcement this past January.

“My passion and the work of the Centre for Early Childhood Read more

Taylor Zakhar Perez Spotted Going Shirtless for Miami Beach Day! Taylor Zakhar Perez is soaking up the sun during a trip to Miami ahead of the holidays!

The 33-year-old actor, who will celebrate his birthday on Christmas Eve, was spotted going shirtless during a beach day on Tuesday (November 18) in Miami, Fla.

Taylor is getting in some rest and relaxation before filming the upcoming sequel to his hit Prime Video movie Red, White & Royal Blue.

During a recent interview, Taylor teased that Red, White & Royal Wedding is set to begin filming in 2026.

Ke Read more

How to Watch 'Wicked' Part One for Free at Home: Streaming Details Revealed Wicked: For Good is being released in theaters this week and you might want to watch the first movie again to catch up, so where is it streaming?

While the first movie had its streaming debut on Peacock earlier this year, Wicked is no longer streaming on there. It’s now on a different streaming service!

Keep reading to find out more…

Amazon Prime Video now is streaming Wicked for all subscribers. You can watch it for free as part of your subscription.If you don’t have a membe Read more

Hallmark Channel Announces Televised Holiday Special Filmed at Hallmark Christmas Experience in Kansas City! Hallmark Channel is getting even more festive during the holiday season this year with the announcement of a brand-new special, which will be filmed at the Hallmark Christmas Experience in Kansas City later this month!

The Hallmark Christmas Experience: A Hometown Holiday Christmas Special will debut on Hallmark Channel on Saturday, December 6 at 10pm ET/PT.

The special will air following the premiere of Lacey Chabert and Andrew Walker‘s new movie She’s Making a List. During the spe Read more

'NCIS' Recasting Update: A Major Character Is Returning 4 Years After Leaving TV Franchise! NCIS is recasting a major character!

Dwayne Pride, originally played by Scott Bakula, will be making a return for the first time in four years, but he’ll be looking a little different.

The Special Agent character will be on our screens again on NCIS: Origins, per a new report.

Keep reading to find out more…

Casting has begun to find a young version of Dwayne, according to TV Insider.

Scott played the role for seven seasons of NCIS: New Orleans, from 2014 to 2021.

The new actor hasn Read more

Cynthia Erivo & Longtime Partner Lena Waithe Shared a Sweet Embrace at 'Wicked' NYC Premiere Cynthia Erivo and Lena Waithe rarely make appearances together in public, but they shared a touching embrace while attending the New York premiere of Wicked: For Good.

The longtime couple walked the red carpet separately at the premiere on Monday night (November 17) at Lincoln Center in New York City.

At one point during the red carpet event, Cynthia and Lena were spotted sharing a sweet embrace.Keep reading to find out more…

Broadway reporter bwaySHO captured the moment and shared the v Read more

Elon Musk Fires Back at Billie Eilish After She Criticized Him on Instagram Elon Musk is responding to Billie Eilish‘s criticism.

The 54-year-old billionaire replied to a fan account on Monday (November 17) that shared screenshots of the “Birds of a Feather” singer slamming him on her Instagram Story.

Keep reading to find out more…

“She’s not the sharpest tool in the shed,” Elon wrote on X.The drama started when Billie reposted a photo slideshow condemning Elon for not using his considerable wealth to do things like stop world Read more

Seth Meyers Claps Back After Trump Slams Him Again Over the Same Late-Night Episode Seth Meyers knows he is currently sitting in President Donald Trump‘s crosshairs.The late-night host talked about being on his “s–t list” during his Monday night (November 17) episode.

Keep reading to find out more…Trump shared a post about Seth over the weekend to his Truth Social account where he claimed the comedian is “suffering from an incurable case of Trump Derangement Syndrome (TDS).” He also said that the NBC show is a “ratings disaster& Read more

Kelsea Ballerini Gets Emotional at Pop-Up Show While Responding to Internet Speculation About Her Music Kelsea Ballerini is responding to the internet speculation about her new music, which also prompted a reaction from her ex-boyfriend Chase Stokes this week.

The 32-year-old country singer performed a pop-up show to celebrate her Mount Pleasant EP on Monday night (November 17) at Vu in Nashville, Tenn.

Kelsea performed the five songs on the EP and opened up to the crowd about each of them.

The song “Emerald City” has been getting the most attention, with fans speculating that the son Read more

TV Shows Canceled in 2025: 8 From CBS, 6 From NBC, 2 From Hulu & More We cannot believe 2025 is coming to an end, and it’s hard to believe that we’ve seen over 75 TV shows canceled this year.

If you’ve been looking for a full recap of all of the major television programs that have been axed by all the biggest streaming services and networks, we have you covered.

Just Jared has been keeping track, and this list of complete as of November 17, 2025.

If you didn’t know, there have been 8 TV shows canceled at CBS, 1 from ABC, 6 from NBC, 2 from Read more

Ashley Tisdale Is Changing Her Name Publicly After Being Married for Over 10 Years Ashley Tisdale is changing her name publicly to Ashley French.

The 40-year-old High School Musical actress has been married to husband Christopher French since 2014, but she has been going by her original name for her career since then.

Now, Ashley wants her name to be the same for her personal and professional lives.

Keep reading to find out more…Ashley and Christopher are parents to kids Jupiter, 4, and Emerson, 13 months. They recently posed for a cute family photo at Disneyland, as s Read more

Epstein Files Bill Passes in House of Representatives: Only 1 Republican Voted No - See Who The House of Representatives have officially voted in the Epstein Files Transparency Acttoday (November 18).

The vote has nearly unanimously passed the act with over 200 Republicans and over 200 Democrats voting to push the bill to the next step. Some members of the House also did not vote. This did not impact the final total, as it is still enough to pass through.

There’s only 1 “no” vote, and that person has been identified.

Keep reading to find out more…

Representati Read more

Gunna Setlist Revealed for 2025 'Wun World Tour' After First Show Gunna has kicked off the Wun World Tour and we have the full set list from the first show!

The Grammy-nominated artist began the tour with a sold-out show on Monday (November 17) at MGM Music Hall in Boston, Mass.The tour will continue with stops in Philadelphia, New York, Toronto, Miami, Los Angeles, and more over the next month. Notably, Gunna added second shows in Toronto, Washington, DC, Amsterdam, and London due to demand.

In 2026, Gunna will be performing in Africa, Australia, and Europe. Read more

Jinkx Monsoon to Return to Broadway's 'Oh, Mary!' for a Very Limited Engagement Jinkx Monsoon will be back on Broadway in the new year!

The beloved Drag Race star will be returning to the role of Mary Todd Lincoln in the Tony-winning play Oh, Mary! for a limited run.

Keep reading to find out more…

Jinkx will resume the title role on January 8, 2026 for 30 performances only through February 1, 2026.“I was plotting my return before my first run was half through,” Monsoon said of her return engagement. “Normally I like more of a break before an encore Read more

Keith Urban performs at Trump's Mar-a-Lago party for billionaire Anthony Pratt Keith Urban performed at a private party attended by President Donald Trump. On Saturday, the country star attended and performed a series of songs at Australian billionaire Anthony Pratt’s event at Mar-a-Lago. Trump, 79, was spotted sitting next to Pratt at the event.According to Axios, Pratt donated $10 million to Trump’s 2024 election campaign, and in April, pledged $5 billion to support Trump’s call to reindustrialize the U.S.KEITH URBAN’S GUITARIST MAGGIE BAUGH Read more

Melissa Joan Hart refused Playboy magazine offer to protect brother and future children Melissa Joan Hart has worn many hats after becoming a certified sitcom star in the '90s.Being the oldest of eight children, the "Sabrina the Teenage Witch" actress admitted she felt the burden of accountability from a young age. The weight of responsibility was so heavy that Hart once refused to appear in Playboy magazine during the height of her fame as a young actress.During an appearance on the "Sibling Revelry" podcast, Hart reflected on her decision to turn down the adult publication and sa Read more

Dick Van Dyke says secret to longevity is young wife 'half' his age Dick Van Dyke is opening up about how his wife helps keep him young.In his new book, "100 Rules for Living to 100," the 99-year-old legendary actor reflects on his life and the lessons he's learned along the way, while also sharing tips on how to live a long life.DICK VAN DYKE ADMITS FEELING ‘DIMINISHED’ PHYSICALLY AND SOCIALLY AHEAD OF 100TH BIRTHDAYThe book features anecdotes from his time on "Mary Poppins," "The Dick Van Dyke Show," "Chitty Chitty Bang Bang" and other classics, wh Read more
